title: Change selected background to light blue

requirements.summary: Update the background color of the selected element to light blue using Tailwind CSS
acceptanceCriteria: The selected element displays a light blue background color
The color change is applied using Tailwind CSS classes consistent with the existing design system

file_operations.description: Add Tailwind CSS light blue background class (bg-blue-100 or bg-sky-100) to the second div element within the main container, which corresponds to the XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]. Ensure the class is applied to the correct wrapper div without affecting child components.
